name: 王国幻境 fantastic kingdom
detailed_description:
《fantastic kingdom》Is a Japanese RPG, also an independent game

More suitable for novice and moderate players' gaming experience——
The game has a rich plot and interesting Branch Task.
Each character has its own story and character background.

There are many interesting elements to increase the gameplay
Fire + wind may increase the additional damage of the flame
Fire + fire may increase the additional damage of burns
Fire + wood may increase the intensity of the flame
Fire + ice may reduce the damage of the flame
Fire + water may invalidate your fire damage
There are also a variety of interesting gameplay and combinations waiting for your discovery and exploration.

All materials in the game are genuine licenses.

Game Features


  • Each character has a different career and background story.
  • Interesting element combination gameplay.
  • Special battlefield system play.
  • You can fight against the monster’s pursuit of relatively free choice by walking away from the monster.
  • You are free to explore the underground palace and open the treasure chest, which may hide your unexpected surprises.
  • Have cute characters animated.

short_description: Let's embark on a mysterious and fantastic journey with the protagonist. What judgments will you make in the face of unknown challenges and unpredictable battles? Is it possible to get out of danger?
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 800 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intergarated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
